title: 一个JAVA的事
author: qq1575550349
txt_content:
他就显示Mods loaded: 1
ModLoader Beta 1.8.1
      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.
If you wish to report this, please copy this entire text and email it to support@mojang.com.
Please include a description of what you did when the error occured.

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 5424363c --------
Generated 11-11-12 下午7:43
Minecraft: Minecraft Beta 1.8.1
OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
Java: 1.6.0_24, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: Radeon X300/X550/X1050 Series version 2.1.8544 Release, ATI Technologies Inc.
java.lang.RuntimeException: Shader compile error! 
in: /shader/water
Fragment shader(s) failed to link,  vertex shader(s) linked. 
Fragment Shader not supported by HW 
at Shader.link(Shader.java:186)
at Shader.<init>(Shader.java:111)
at iw.<init>(EntityRenderer.java:127)
at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:258)
at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:629)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 71cd7980 ----------

replies.author: MrDanteDavid
replies.txt_content:
把反射水MOD 里的 CONFIG.txt 修改一下

在anti aliasing 改成 1

在reflection_resolution 改成 2

再试试看

replies.author: abc52woool
replies.txt_content: 表示看不懂    你还是重按把

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 这是普通的crash 由于游戏自身问题引起的 再开吧 玩mc难免崩溃

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
MOD安裝, 請詳細查看原帖說明, 或內附說明文件, 確實按照安裝步驟進行安裝... 
記得刪除 minecraft.jar 裡的 META-INF 文件夾...

replies.author: qq1575550349
replies.txt_content:
abc52woool 发表于 2011-11-12 20:52 
表示看不懂    你还是重按把
重按
不行

replies.txt_content:

怎么又是你
